root.name: Gundam Battle Assault 2
root.description: Gundam Battle Assault Character List (listed by timeline in Alphabetical order):Universal Century (Mobile Suit Gundam, 08th MS Team, 0080, 0083, Zeta Gundam, Gundam ZZ, Char's Counterattack)Acguy (Akahana)Ball (Shiro Amada)Big-Zam (Dozle Zabi)GP-02A Physalis (Anavel Gato)Full Armor ZZ Gundam (Judau Ashta)Hygogg (Mikhail Kaminsky)Neue Ziel (Anavel Gato)Nu Gundam (Amuro Ray)Quin Mantha (Puru Two)RX-78-2 Gundam (Amuro Ray)Sazabi (Char Aznable)Zaku II (Denim)Zaku II Commander Type (Char Aznable)Zeong (Char Aznable)Future Century (Mobile Fighter G Gundam)Bolt Gundam (Argo Gulskii)Burning Gundam (Domon Kasshu)Dark Gundam (Kyouji Kasshu)Dragon Gundam (Sai Saichi)Gundam Maxter (Chibodee Crockett)Gundam Rose (George de Sand)Master Gundam (Master Asia)Psycho Gundam Mk. III (Ulube)After Colony (New Mobile Report Gundam Wing, Endless Waltz)Altron Gundam (Chang Wufei)Gundam Deathscythe Hell (Duo Maxwell)Gundam Epyon (Treize Khushrenada)Gundam Heavyarms Custom (Trowa Barton)Gundam Sandrock Custom (Quatre Raberba Winner)Hydra Gundam (Valdor Farkill)Talgeese III (Zechs Merquise)Wing Gundam Zero Custom (Heero Yuy)
